metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18450 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before 12.4 in the Project labels feature. It has Insecure Permissions.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects all previous GitLab CE/EE versions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
